content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, nice to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in München to be a great place to live. Let's negotiate the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Mister Schmidt, I am a student and I am looking for an apartment that fits my budget. I think 500 Euros per month would be a reasonable price for this apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 500 Euros per month is very low for an apartment of this quality in the city center. I'm sure you understand that I need to cover my costs and make a profit. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I can understand your point of view. How about 600 Euros per month? I think this is a more reasonable offer for an apartment like this.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 600 Euros per month is still below the market value for this location. The apartment is brand new and in the city center, close to all amenities. I'm looking for a tenant who can appreciate the value of this property. Would you be willing to go higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I can understand your perspective. How about 700 Euros per month? I think this is a fair offer, taking into account the quality of the apartment and its location.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 700 Euros per month is closer to what I'm looking for, but still not the market rate for this area. The apartment is brand new and in high demand. I'm sure you'll find it to be a great investment for your student life. Would you be willing to go up to 800 Euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mister Schmidt. Since you mentioned that the apartment is in high demand, I am willing to go up to 800 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Excellent, Emilia. Your offer of 800 Euros per month is very close to my asking price. I'm sure you'll enjoy living in such a prime location. Let's make a deal at 800 Euros per month. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
